alert.note: Alert for Dooly; Houston; Pulaski (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 5:27PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Pulaski, northeastern Dooly and southern Houston Counties through 600 PM EDT... At 527 PM EDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated strong winds ahead of a line of thunderstorms along a line extending from near Saint Louis to near Henderson to Lilly, and moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind preceding rain or lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds will occur before any rain or lightning. Do not wait for the sound of thunder before taking cover. Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Perry, Hawkinsville, Unadilla, Pinehurst, Lilly, Hayneville, Browndale, Meadowdale, Grovania, Mobley Crossing, Elko, Mock Springs, Grove Park, Finleyson, Wallace, Ocmulgee Public Fishing Area, Moss Oak, Hartford, Pulaski State Prison, and Henderson. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for central and west central Georgia.
